senses.sense_definition: A rowdy celebration, spree, or disorderly behavior, often involving drinking.

examples.text: The group went out on the <w>randan</w> to celebrate the end of the exams.
He spent the entire weekend on the <w>randan</w> and regretted it on Monday morning.

senses.sense_definition: The product of a second sifting of meal, specifically the finest part of the bran.

examples.text: The miller carefully separated the <w>randan</w> from the rest of the flour.
Farmers sometimes used <w>randan</w> mixed with other grains to feed their livestock.

senses.sense_definition: A boat propelled by three oarsmen.

examples.text: The crew launched the <w>randan</w> into the river for the afternoon race.
Rowing a <w>randan</w> requires coordination between the three oarsmen.
